column4: Hi guys. I recently tried out Truecrypt, and made a virtual drive file on my usb stick. After a while, I decided I did not need the file any longer and got rid of it as per Truecrypt instructions (mount file, remove insides, unmount file, delete file). However, the 3GB of space I set aside for the file did not get recovered by the USB drive. What's going on?
I'm hoping it wouldn't have to come to that.
just an idea, is the file moved into .Trash-1000 or similar on the usb drive?
